subject: Hockey, Ice
Officiating (Sports)
Organized Labor
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: An Ontario labor board will hear the case of Dean Warren, who was fired by the N.H.L. in April 2008 after seven seasons.
snippet: An Ontario labor board will hear the case of Dean Warren, who was fired by the N.H.L. in April 2008 after seven seasons.
